issue.title: [CF 1413] Add the option to desaturate icons
issue.body:
It is possible to use a grayscale variant of a texture in WoW (http://wowprogramming.com/docs/widgets/Texture/IsDesaturated). Adding this option to TellMeWhen would allow myself to just use grayscale icons instead of converting them to grayscale with photoshop.


> Posted by CurseForge user Lyzu | Imported from CurseForge issue #1413 | Raw

comments.body:
It's already there. Click the icon next to the opacity sliders.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
